# 2000 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 2000 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 2001 for the 2000 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 2000 are as follows.
